name: @terascope/elasticsearch-api
description: Elasticsearch client api used across multiple services, handles retries and exponential backoff
author: Terascope, LLC <info@terascope.io>

scripts.test:elasticsearch6: TEST_RESTRAINED_ELASTICSEARCH='true' ELASTICSEARCH_VERSION='6.8.6' yarn workspace @terascope/scripts ts-scripts test ../elasticsearch-api --
scripts.test:elasticsearch7: TEST_RESTRAINED_ELASTICSEARCH='true' ELASTICSEARCH_VERSION='7.9.3' yarn workspace @terascope/scripts ts-scripts test ../elasticsearch-api --
scripts.test:elasticsearch8: TEST_RESTRAINED_ELASTICSEARCH='true' ELASTICSEARCH_VERSION='8.1.2' yarn workspace @terascope/scripts ts-scripts test ../elasticsearch-api --
scripts.test:opensearch2: TEST_RESTRAINED_OPENSEARCH='true' OPENSEARCH_VERSION='2.15.0' yarn workspace @terascope/scripts ts-scripts test --debug ../elasticsearch-api --
